Text:
I have yet to find a format that VLC wont play, so stick to using VLC, and no matter what it'll work. 

For those that to want to burn it, you're on the best site for pirated software, just search for a converter, and you'll have your .avi-file within minutes. As to WHY, i have no clue, nor did i have any problems, good quality, small size, quick download. +1 from me, big thanks for UL tony.
